item.title: [DELTA]Need help fixing AGS spec.[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Woopzpkedu Woopzpkedu
item.description:
@Woopzpkedu wrote:

[quote=“mikeyboy09, post:1, topic:383766”]When I spec the animation is horrible and isn’t right at all… (NPC’s)

I’m not sure if it works in PVP since it’s not online and my laptop is too slow to load up 2 clients…

Anyway can anybody help me add the right code for it?

My code for AGS spec right now is…

[code=java]
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){
setAnimation(2086);
specialAmount -= 50;
frame174(385, 000, 020);

hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit + 30);
getHit(45);
specOn = false;
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
lowGFX(655,0);
}[/code]
and

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 2086); npcDamage(30); lowGFX(655,0); }

Any help is appreciated

  • Mikey [/quote]
setAnimation(2086);
learn to read

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA]Need help fixing AGS spec.[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @mikeyboy09 mikeyboy09
item.description:
@mikeyboy09 wrote:

When I spec the animation is horrible and isn’t right at all… (NPC’s)

I’m not sure if it works in PVP since it’s not online and my laptop is too slow to load up 2 clients…

Anyway can anybody help me add the right code for it?

My code for AGS spec right now is…

[code=java]
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){
setAnimation(2086);
specialAmount -= 50;
frame174(385, 000, 020);

hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit + 30);
getHit(45);
specOn = false;
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
lowGFX(655,0);
}[/code]
and

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 2086); npcDamage(30); lowGFX(655,0); }

Any help is appreciated
